price: Ó sì máa fi ara pamọ́ fún àwọn ènìyàn nítorí ìró aburú tí wọ́n fún un. Ṣé ó máa gbà a mú ní n̄ǹkan àbùkù ni tàbí ó máa bò ó mọ́lẹ̀ láàyè? Ẹ gbọ́, ohun tí wọ́n ń dá lẹ́jọ́ burú!
arabic: يَتَوَٰرَىٰ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ مِن سُوٓءِ مَا بُشِّرَ بِهِۦٓۚ أَيُمۡسِكُهُۥ عَلَىٰ هُونٍ أَمۡ يَدُسُّهُۥ فِي ٱلتُّرَابِۗ أَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yatawārā mina al-qawmi min sūi mā bushira bihi ayum'sikuhu ʿalā hūnin am yadussuhu fī al-turābi alā sāa mā yaḥkumūna
translations: he has been given good news
